body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Choose the English word for the Chinese word in the audio.
body.correct: Job well done! 女孩 nǚhái means “girl,” 女 nǚ means “female,” and 孩 hái means “child.” Pay special attention to the first syllable nǚ.”
body.incorrect: Very close. Please try to listen to the audio again.

body.quiz: Choose the English word for the Chinese word in the audio.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Do you want to listen to the audio one more time?

body.quiz: How would you respond to the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 你好 nǐhǎo
options: Audio for 再见 zàijiàn
Audio for 朋友 péngyǒu
Audio for 男孩 nánhái
body.correct: Excellent job! When people say “你好 nǐhǎo (Hello),”. you respond by saying “你好 nǐhǎo (Hello),” too.
body.incorrect: So close! Please listen again and pay attention to both initials.

body.quiz: Choose the English word for the Chinese word in the audio.
body.correct: Wonderful job! 男孩 nánhái means “boy.” 男 nán means “male,” 孩 hái means “child.”
body.incorrect: So close! Please listen again and pay attention to both initials.

body.quiz: When would you use the word in the audio?
body.answer: At the end of the conversation
options: At the beginning of a conversation
As a response to meeting someone
body.correct: You got it! We say 再见 zàijiàn to end a conversation or to depart from someone.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Pay attention to the first initial that’s said.
